title: Funky sans serif type
content:
Can’t find this font. Thanks for you help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090911032627im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Titel007_6029.jpg)
author: lubitel

comments.content: I can’t find it either, but it is quite nice... You could re-design it from these 5 characters though... Maybe try [www.identifont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090911032627/http:/www.identifont.com/ "www.identifont.com") to find similar.
its pretty nice and also works well at small sizes.
It’s a great looking font...does anyone know?
it seems to have been designed by adamsandevas “using a lettering tool from jonathan puckey”. that’s what I found in the colophon of the photo catalogue. its probably not for sale anywhere.
Do you know of a name, or PDF files that contain it?
